ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He will say, 'Slink away into it and do not speak to Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He will say: "Remain condemned in it, and do not speak to Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Allah will say: "Away from Me; stay where you are and do not address Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He will say, "Be quiet and say nothing."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Allah will say, “Remain rebuked in it, and do not speak to Me.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He (Allah) will say: "Remain you in it with ignominy! And speak you not to Me!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He shall say: Go away into it and speak not to Me;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Slink you into it,' He shall say, 'and do not speak to Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He saith: Begone therein, and speak not unto Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: God will say, "Stay there and do not speak to Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He shall say: slink away there unto, and speak not unto Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He will say, ‘Begone in it, and do not speak to Me!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He will say: "Be ye driven into it (with ignominy)! And speak ye not to Me!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He (Allah) will say: "Remain you in it with ignominy! And speak you not to Me!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He will say: 'Slink there in it and do not speak to Me'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He will say, “Be despised therein, and do not speak to Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: He will say, "Remain despised therein and do not speak to Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [23:108] He will say, to them by the tongue of a Keeper [of Hell], whose proportion is twice the size of this world: ‘Begone in it, away with you in the Fire, despicable [as you are], and do not speak to Me, about relieving you from the chastisement — so that [all] their hope is extinguished.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He saith) Allah says to them: (Be gone therein) be abased in hell, (and speak not unto Me) and do not ask Me to get you out of hell.
